entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Baccaro Point
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:50 AM AST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Baccaro Point 2:00 PM AST Saturday 04 March 2023
Temperature: -0.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 99 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -1.1°C
Wind: ENE 60 km/h gust 73 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Blowing snow over exposed areas late this afternoon. Amount 10 to 20 cm except 30 cm along parts of the coast. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northeast 30 gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast late this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas this evening. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast this evening. Wind becoming north 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Clearing. High 6.
entry.summary: Clearing late in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 late in the morning. High 6. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.summary: Clear. Windy. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Saturday 04 March 2023
